message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $140. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. I'm willing to pay a fair price, but I want to make sure I'm getting a good deal.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I can't go as low as $130. How about we meet in the middle at $135?

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my target price. Would you be willing to go down to $132? I'm really interested in this product, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal.
